FuncDef: This command configures the frequency at which the querier router sends a group-specific query messages, including the messages sent in response to leave-group messages. The shorter the interval, the faster the loss of the last member of a group can be detected. If nothing is configured, by default, thequery-last-listener-intervaltakes the value defined in theconfig>router>mldcontext or in theconfig>service>vprn>mld context. It is highly recommended that all three query intervals be configured together on each MLD policy.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the frequency, in seconds, at which query messages are sent. Values-1 to 1023.
